thread.title: David Wilson

author: David Wilson
title: David Wilson
text:
I use TransferWise for both business and personal purposes. The rate of exchange is always spot-on with that on XE Currency unlike the banks which give a 'bank market rate' which is always 5% lower. In fact I recently closed my foreign currency account with Barclays because their rates plus charges are way higher.
Keep it up TransferWise I will certainly continue to use your service.
